title: Novi CEO on AI Driven Shopping Trends
description: Kimberly Shenk, CEO of Novi, says the company works with leading retailers to optimize product data for AI driven discovery. She tells Carol Massar on "Bloomberg Markets" that brands rely on Novi to help consumers find the right products more easily through AI. (Source: Bloomberg)
